task.title: Register Htek Phone with
task.shortdesc: This article is based on Htek UC903 and v81.8.0.7v30.8.0.14.

taskbody.context:
This article is applicable to the Htek UC series 802, 803, 804, 840, 842, 806, 862, 902, 903, 923, 924, 926.
For the IP phone with different firmware version, the web GUI may be different.

step.cmd: Log in the web page of the phone.
Click Account tab, choose one account to configure.

choices.choice: Account: Select one account to configure.
Primary SIP Server: Fill in the domain or IP address of your PBX.
SIP Transport: Choose the same transport of the PBX. The default SIP transport on the PBX is UDP.
Label: Set the name you want to appear on the phone screen.
SIP User ID: Fill in the extension number.
Authentication ID: Fill in the extension's Registration Name.
Authentication Password: Fill in the extension's Registration Password.
Name: The local phone name showing on the other phone when calling out.

step.info: If the extension is registered, the page will show "Registered".
